segments.text: Yes ! I finally lost that last five pounds I've been working on forever !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How did you finally do it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A friend suggested that I stop nibbling between meals .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , a little piece of chocolate here , some chips on the side , candy now and then ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Instead , I sit down and have a good snack like a piece of fruit between meals .
segments.speaker: S1
